segments.title: Good Behavior Praise
segments.text: I've been watching you all year, {name}, and I'm so proud of how good you've been! You've been kind to others, helped your family, and tried your best in everything you do.

segments.title: Christmas Spirit
segments.text: The Christmas spirit shines so brightly in you, {name}! Your kindness and joy make the whole world a little more magical. That's exactly what Christmas is all about!

segments.title: Special Gift Mention
segments.text: I have something very special planned for you this Christmas, {name}. The elves and I have been working extra hard to make sure it's perfect just for you!

segments.title: Keep Believing
segments.text: Remember, {name}, the magic of Christmas lives in your heart. Keep believing, keep being kind, and keep spreading joy wherever you go!

segments.title: Family Love
segments.text: I can see how much love you have for your family, {name}, and how much they love you too. That love is the greatest gift of all!

segments.title: School Achievement
segments.text: I heard from the elves that you've been working so hard at school, {name}! Learning new things and being curious about the world makes Santa very happy!

segments.title: Helping Others
segments.text: What makes me most proud, {name}, is how you help others and share your toys. That generous heart of yours is what makes Christmas truly special!

goodbyeMessages.title: Classic Santa Goodbye
goodbyeMessages.text: Ho ho ho! Merry Christmas, {name}! Be good, and I'll see you next year!

goodbyeMessages.title: Magical Goodbye
goodbyeMessages.text: The magic of Christmas will always be with you, {name}. Until we meet again, keep the Christmas spirit alive in your heart! Ho ho ho!

goodbyeMessages.title: Adventure Goodbye
goodbyeMessages.text: What an amazing adventure we've had together, {name}! Remember, every day can be as magical as Christmas if you believe! Ho ho ho!

goodbyeMessages.title: Warm Goodbye
goodbyeMessages.text: Give your family a big hug from Santa, {name}! I'll be thinking of you on Christmas morning. Ho ho ho! Merry Christmas!
